tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RobotFarmEquipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  equipment_type VARCHAR(100),
  purchase_date DATE,
  efficiency_rating FLOAT,
  performance_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE RobotPerformance (
  robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  farm_equipment_id INT,
  performance_metric VARCHAR(50),
  performance_value FLOAT,
  performance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FarmEquipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  purchase_date DATE,
  warranty_expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE RobotSensors (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id UUID,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    sensor_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE FarmEquipment (
    equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE Robot (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), model VARCHAR(255), manufacturer VARCHAR(255), year_of_manufacture INT);
CREATE TABLE FarmEquipment (id INT PRIMARY KEY, type VARCHAR(255), brand VARCHAR(255), manufacturer VARCHAR(255), year_of_manufacture INT);
CREATE TABLE PerformanceData (id INT PRIMARY KEY, robot_id INT, equipment_id INT, date DATE, efficiency FLOAT, speed FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog (id INT PRIMARY KEY, robot_id INT, equipment_id INT, date DATE, description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE RobotFarmEquipment (
    equipment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    warranty_expiry DATE
);

CREATE TABLE EquipmentPerformance (
    performance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT REFERENCES RobotFarmEquipment(equipment_id),
    performance_date DATE,
    efficiency DECIMAL(4,2),
    average_speed DECIMAL(4,2),
    fuel_consumption DECIMAL(6,2),
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL(8,2)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT REFERENCES RobotFarmEquipment(equipment_id),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL(8,2),
    maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EquipmentUsage (
    usage_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT REFERENCES RobotFarmEquipment(equipment_id),
    usage_date DATE,
    acres_covered DECIMAL(6,2),
    hours_used DECIMAL(6,2),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE EquipmentMalfunction (
    malfunction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT REFERENCES RobotFarmEquipment(equipment_id),
    malfunction_date DATE,
    malfunction_description TEXT,
    repair_cost DECIMAL(8,2),
    repair_date DATE
);
